title: Need help with font identification
content:
Can you help identify the font in the attachment?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [beats-by-dre.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016061531/http:/typophile.com/files/beats-by-dre.jpg) | 35.11 KB |
author: madfred2k

comments.content: My guess is it's a customized Avante Garde—unless you've seen it used in a lot of copy.
